title: (x) Odyssey - Tango {Mark S}
content:
Does anybody knows this type?   
   
thanks!
author: weeliam

comments.content: which type? there's no image attached

It's [Tango](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124609/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/tango/tango/testdrive.html?s=Odyssey&p=48) by Colin Brignall. I think it was orignally a Letraset font. The extra blobs in the sample have nothing to do with the font.
